about.title: About Me
about.par1: I’m a fullstack web developer focused on modern web applications. Using technologies like React, Next.js, Node.js, and MongoDB, I build scalable solutions – from the frontend to the backend architecture.
about.par2: I enjoy working on projects where design and functionality go hand in hand – whether it’s simple websites or more complex applications. I especially enjoy using React, Next.js, and Node.js, but I’m always open to learning new things.
about.par3: I'm currently open to exciting new projects – remote or on-site. I look forward to turning your ideas into high-quality applications.
